actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Family and Human Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Family and Human Services

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization for the low-income home energy assistance program for three years, and for other purposes.
short_title: Low Income Home Energy Assistance Reauthorization Act

summary.text: Low Income Home Energy Assistance Reauthorization Act - Amends the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to authorize appropriations for low-income home energy assistance for FY 1985 through 1987.

titles.title: Low Income Home Energy Assistance Reauthorization Act
A bill to extend the authorization for the low-income home energy assistance program for three years, and for other purposes.
